sentence.Network_en: He gazed reflectively at his companion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他盯着自己的同伴，若有所思。
吉姆沉思着捋了捋胡子.

sentence.Network_en: "The first part of her life hasn't been all that good," he said reflectively.
sentence.Network_cn: “她早年的生活并非一帆风顺，”他若有所思地说。

list.abs: 反射 (Reflection) 是指在程序在运行时 (run-time) 获取类信息的方式. 诸如实现动态创建类实例, 方法等. 在很语言中都有相关的的实.
教学反思(reflection)是教师以自己的教学活动为思考对象，来对自己所做出的行为、决策以及由此所产生的结果进行审视和研究的过程…
手术放大镜_百度百科 ... 景深（ Depth of Field） 反射率（reflectance）（ Reflectance） 视场范围（ Field of View）.
在物理常用的英文单词_百度知道 ... reference level 参考级 reflectance 反射比 reflected ray 反射线 .
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... define 限定，下定义 reflect 反射，反映 flexible 易弯曲的.
思考（Reflect）将自己的听课随感、意见、经验体会之类的内容，与讲课内容区分开，写在卡片或笔记本的某一单独部分，加上标题 …

entry.def: If you are reflective, you are thinking deeply about something.

example.ex: I walked on in a reflective mood to the car...
example.tran: 我心事重重地向车子走去。

example.ex: Mike is a quiet, reflective man.
example.tran: 迈克是一个文静、喜欢沉思的人。

entry.tran: 反映…的;表现…的;代表性的
entry.def: If something is reflective of a particular situation or attitude, it is typical of that situation or attitude, or is a consequence of it.

example.ex: The German government's support of the US is not entirely reflective of German public opinion...
example.tran: 德国政府对美国的支持不完全是德国公众意见的反映。

example.ex: The pupil's answers may not have been reflective of what the class as a whole had understood.
example.tran: 这个学生的回答也许并不能代表该班级整体的理解。

entry.def: A reflective surface or material sends back light or heat.

example.ex: ...a garden of flowing streams, water basins, waterfalls, and a reflective pool...
example.tran: 园里有流动的小溪、水池、瀑布和波光粼粼的游泳池

example.ex: Avoid pans with a shiny, reflective base as the heat will be reflected back.
example.tran: 不要使用锅底光亮、能反射热的平底锅，因为热量会被反射回去。

auth_sentence.content: But reflectively I wonder why nobody did so before.
auth_sentence.res_content: But reflectively I wonder why nobody did so before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But reflectively I wonder why nobody did so before.

auth_sentence.content: He pulled at his lip reflectively and snorted again.
auth_sentence.res_content: He pulled at his lip reflectively and snorted again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He pulled at his lip reflectively and snorted again.

auth_sentence.content: His will is divided, and his actions proceed from desires with which he does not reflectively identify.
auth_sentence.res_content: His will is divided, and his actions proceed from desires with which he does not reflectively identify.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His will is divided, and his actions proceed from desires with which he does not reflectively identify.
